sentence.text: ETV1/4/5 factors are often overexpressed in prostate cancer and genome-wide studies in a prostate cancer cell line indicate that positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and MED25 occupy enhancers that are enriched for ETS-binding sequences and are both functionally important for the transcription of genes regulated by these enhancers.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
